paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import nltk
from collections import Counter
counters = tokensDF.rdd.map(lambda x: Counter(x.tokens_lower)).collect()
counter = Counter()
for c in counters:
    counter.update(c)
countDF = spark.createDataFrame(counter.most_common(100), ['word', 'count'])
countDF.show()

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
counters = tokensDF.rdd.map(lambda x: Counter(nltk.bigrams(x.tokens_lower))).collect()
counter = Counter()
for c in counters:
    counter.update(c)
countDF = spark.createDataFrame(counter.most_common(100), ['bigram', 'count'])
countDF.show()

%pyspark
counters = tokensDF.rdd.map(lambda x: Counter(nltk.trigrams(x.tokens_lower))).collect()
counter = Counter()
for c in counters:
    counter.update(c)
countDF = spark.createDataFrame(counter.most_common(100), ['trigram', 'count'])
countDF.show(truncate=False)
